item.title: My Dragon Pickaxe
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:26, topic:301990”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=398327.msg2957215#msg2957215 date=1252898919]

Looks good to me. Jagex needs to stop with the bull shit updates and crappy models. Dylan and Silent are 1000x better then Jagex profs.

There is one specific reason. If you pay attention to Jagex’s face limits on models. Its hard to make GOOD models for that game. My friend managed to make a rs client that could load a 5k face model, but it had emense lag. So he deleted it.

Actually, its not hard to make low poly models, that is, ofcourse, if you intended to make it low poly anyways.
[/quote]

Well Dylan, the thing is if you have ever started on a model and not had to take out some faces to make it rs compatable? Ive had to many times, even for the Theif’s Scimitar.[/quote]
Oh yea, i find it easy as can be. keep in mind that i use primitive modelling, which is easier to get low poly than traces since well, you dont know how many faces you have until its too late. many of my models are now stopped when theyre low poly, added here, and then i finish the high poly one, just so i can show off both .

Read full topic

item.title: My Dragon Pickaxe
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:22, topic:301990”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=398327.msg2956947#msg2956947 date=1252885280]

Looks good to me. Jagex needs to stop with the bull shit updates and crappy models. Dylan and Silent are 1000x better then Jagex profs.

There is one specific reason. If you pay attention to Jagex’s face limits on models. Its hard to make GOOD models for that game. My friend managed to make a rs client that could load a 5k face model, but it had emense lag. So he deleted it.
[/quote]
Actually, its not hard to make low poly models, that is, ofcourse, if you intended to make it low poly anyways.[/quote]

Well Dylan, the thing is if you have ever started on a model and not had to take out some faces to make it rs compatable? Ive had to many times, even for the Theif’s Scimitar.

Read full topic
